item.description:
CFL is sponsoring an educational booth at the Oyster Fest in Nowalk at Veterans Park. Here's the schedule:

Friday 9/10 6 PM - 11 PM
Sat 9/11 11 AM - 11 PM
Sun 9/12 1 PM - 8 PM

Help us by showing up!

We also have a Chipin. Contribute a small amount and help us with educational materials!

http://widget.chipin....

John Birch will join us Saturday and Sunday.

For more information see www.seaport.org/oysterfest.html

See you all there! Last year, our first year, was fantastic. We must have met about 3,000 people, and the weather wasn't that great either! This year promises to be even better. We'll be handing out literature, talking about liberty. If you'd like to join us in our outreach, get in touch.

Jim Azzola
Local Coordinator, CFL
(800)604-1256
item.name: Campaign for Liberty at Norwalk Oyster Fest!
